briefTitle: 68Ga-PSMA-11 PET in Patients With Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: 68Ga-PSMA-11 PET in Patients With Prostate Cancer

arms.label: Men with pathologically proven prostate adenocarcinoma

summary: Patients will receive a single dose of 68Ga-PSMA-11 and undergo a PET/CT or PET/MRI imaging study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Immediately after administration and for 1 hour and 30 minutes afterwards
